sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
Hocus Pocus Junior The anatomy of legerdemain. Or, The art of iugling set forth in his proper colours, fully, plainly, and exactly; so that an ignorant person may thereby learn the full perfection of the same, after a little practise. Unto each trick is added the figure, where it is needfull for instruction.
The third edition, with many additions.
[64] p. : ill.
Printed by I. D[awson] for R. M[ab] and are to be sold by Francis Grove at his shop upon Snow-hill, neer the Sarazens-head, London : 1638.
Printer's and publisher's names from STC. Signatures: A-H⁴. Running title reads: The art of legerdemain discovered. Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
=======

Printed by I. D[awson] for R. M[ab] and are to be sold by Francis Grove at his shop upon Snow-hill, neer the Sarazens-head, London : 1638.
